item.title: What I liked about python
item.description: My favorite part about what we learned about python in class was regex and it being a simple yet powerful tool. It allows the user to sort out and find things quickly and efficiently. It wasn't until I understood the code below did it start to click with me. That ‘aha’ moment of understanding felt like magic and I'm glad I took the time to decipher why both bits of code yielded what they did.
